title: COVID-19 Caused My Husband To Confess
itunes:title: COVID-19 Caused My Husband To Confess
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my husband and I are having some real marital issues right now and I blame it on Covid-19. We haven’t been stuck together for this long, without being able to go to work or to play tennis or go shopping. My husband says I irritate him all day long and I’m sick of seeing him sitting up all day watching TV. We had a big fight that got really ugly and as my husband left the room, he mumbled that he couldn’t wait to get back to his baby. I asked him to repeat it, but he wouldn’t..................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my husband and I are having some real marital issues right now and I blame it on Covid-19. We haven’t been stuck together for this long, without being able to go to work or to play tennis or go shopping. My husband says I irritate him all day long and I’m sick of seeing him sitting up all day watching TV. We had a big fight that got really ugly and as my husband left the room, he mumbled that he couldn’t wait to get back to his baby. I asked him to repeat it, but he wouldn’t..................
